name: Beeple on a Pedestal
description: Whose voices are you elevating with your attention and your investments? What platforms are you supporting? What happens when we trade people as tokens? What happens when people are assigned clout based on what they’ve bought, not what they’ve built? Do your actions align with your values and your purpose? Beeple on a Pedestal is my answer to those questions. The first purchaser of this NFT is entitled to receive the physical amigurumi, worldwide shipping included.
